description.narrative: Planning and management capacities of national and decentralized entities, including school communities, have been strengthened to improve schools' performance and resilience, mainstream accountability across the education sector and transform resources into greater results for schools, learning outcomes and most vulnerable childrenUNDAF/Produit 4.3 Les institutions en charge de l'Ã©ducation et de la formation disposent de capacitÃ©s de pilotage et de gestion renforcÃ©es permettant de transformer les ressources disponibles en rÃ©sultats accrus (GAR) et d'asseoir une culture de transparence, d'inclusion dans la prise de dÃ©cision, et de redevabilitÃ© Ã tous les niveaux du systÃ¨me, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Learning Outcomes, Skills Development, Skills Development (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children of school-going age (3 to 16 years), particularly the most vulnerable, have access to quality education services and complete a full cycle of basic education with improved learning outcomes

title.narrative: Planning and management capacities of national and decentralized entities, including school communities, have been strengthened to improve schools’ performance and resilience, mainstream accountability across the education sector and transform resources into greater results for schools, learning outcomes and most vulnerable childrenUNDAF/Produit 4.3 Les institutions en charge de l'éducation et de la formation disposent de capacités de pilotage et de gestion renforcées permettant de transformer les ressources disponibles en résultats accrus (GAR) et d'asseoir une culture de transparence, d'inclusion dans la prise de décision, et de redevabilité à tous les niveaux du système

description.narrative: Despite the fragile institutional context, UNICEF supported the preparation of significant policy shifts (e.g. on inclusive education; civil registration; language policy) and reinforced the education management and information system by collecting new evidence and data (e.g., on out-of-school children; disabilities ; school-based violence; pupils lacking civil registration) and by introducing management dashboards at all levels of the education system. Planning and management capacity was also strengthened in 210 school management committees, 54 local governments and 35 decentralized authorities in eight target regions, as well as at the national level. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Progression dans la gestion de la question enseignante : (1) Analyses inities , (2) Recommandations formules , (3) Orientations adoptes , (4) Actions mises en uvre
